About Me

Growing up, I loved to explore new applications, websites, and technologies on my computer. That, coupled with my ambition to tackle challenges and learn new concepts, led me to pursue my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. I have continued to fall deeper and deeper in love with the field upon completing my coursework, and that has only progressed as I’ve begun my career.

Adapting to various work environments, effectively identifying and resolving issues, and strong collaboration skills have always been striking features of my working style. Alongside my prior experience working in Data Science, Software Engineering, and DevOps Engineering roles, I am always interested in developing my skills and learning something new!

Vinylfy is a web application which generates a customized vinyl record design for users, based on their Spotify listening preferences within the past 4 weeks.
